name: AAA
description:
'''AAA''' (pronounced '''Triple A'''; also an [[acronym]] for '''Attack All Around''') is a Japanese [[pop music|pop]] group signed to the label [[Avex Trax]] which debuted in September 2005. The name has the meaning of "challenging everything" or "against all odds", and the group is marketed by their label as a "super performance unit".

The group was formed through Avex's own auditions, and originally consisted of five young men and three young women who had appeared in commercials and/or had prior experience as backup dancers for other Japanese stars, such as [[Ayumi Hamasaki]] and [[Ami Suzuki]].
